title: Monster Truck Racing
description:
Giant wheels and incredible engine powerâ€”Monster Trucks are amazing machines built for high performance on rough terrains.  In this mini-game, players race to the finish line with monster trucks on an obstacle course.  Drive your truck, perform jumps and flips, and be the first to reach the flag. 
Monster Truck Racing is a 2D single-player racing game where you'll strive to outpace opponents on steep tracks.
